interest.name: Truffula Tree Grove
interest.description: Wander among the colorful, fluffy Truffula trees and learn about their importance to the environment.

interest.name: Mount Crumpit Overlook
interest.description: Hike to the top for a panoramic view of Whoville and maybe spot the Grinch’s cave!

interest.name: Green Eggs & Ham Café
interest.description: Enjoy a quirky meal at Sam-I-Am’s famous eatery, serving green eggs and ham all day.

interest.name: Sneetch Beach
interest.description: Relax on the sandy shores where star-bellied and plain-bellied Sneetches play together.

interest.name: Horton’s Listening Post
interest.description: Visit the spot where Horton heard a Who—great for photos and learning about kindness.

interest.name: Lorax’s Environmental Center
interest.description: Interactive exhibits about caring for the earth, hosted by the Lorax himself.

interest.name: Cat in the Hat Playground
interest.description: A whimsical playground with giant hats, slides, and Thing 1 & Thing 2 games.

interest.name: Yertle’s Turtle Tower
interest.description: Climb the stack and see the world from Yertle’s point of view—just don’t topple the turtles!
